statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 4 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ 5 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ -5 \\ -5 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ -5 \\ 12 \\ -8 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 4 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ 5 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ -5 \\ -5 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ -5 \\ 12 \\ -8 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
